Package awesome.platform.shadows

This package provides utilities for adding new shadows to Awesome.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddShadow The main class that generates the aspects based on the shadow specifications.
AddShadowGen  
AddShadowWriter Is responsible to call the code generator and write the generated aspect code within the target package.
ShadowSpec A shadow specification.
 

Package awesome.platform.shadows Description

This package provides utilities for adding new shadows to Awesome.

A short User Guide (How to add a new shadow):

  • Add your shadow specification to the file Shadows.Spec. For instance, the following specification adds a new shadow for division operations: 
     ID: DivisionOp
 INSTRUCTION_SET: { ddiv, fdiv, idiv, ldiv }
    See, e.g., http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_bytecode_instruction_listings, for the names of all bytecode instructions.

  • Next, execute AddShadow.main, and an AspectJ aspect that adds the new shadow will be generated within the package awesome.platform.shadows.gen (currently, an aspect is (re)generated for each of the shadow specifications).
